meanings.definition: Resembling a mask in appearance or function.
meanings.sent1: Her masklike expression hid her true feelings.
meanings.sent2: The costume had a masklike design on the front.
meanings.sent3: He wore a masklike smile to cover up his nervousness.
meanings.sent4: The fog created a masklike veil over the city.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the masklike features of the ancient deity.
